attribute.attributeDefinition: The unique code for each baseline program project funded through the SC MPA Baseline Program. This code refers to a specific entry on the SC_MPA_BaselineProgramInformation_LookupTable.
The unique letter code that indicates where the transect is located. This ID refers to a specific entry in the site table.
The specific organism that this transect was created to monitor.

textDomain.definition: Name of the organism as identified on the Integrated Taxonomic Information System (ITIS, http://www.itis.usda.gov). In cases where substrate or other non taxonomic name is used, classification determined by the survey team.

attribute.attributeDefinition: Replicate transect number, starting from 1. In general, the length of the transect is 10 meters.
The method used for sampling the transect.

The year this transect configuration was established. This year is expressed in YYYY format. Dates reflect measurements taken in local time. Local time is Pacific Standard Time except during months when Pacific Daylight Time is effective.

The month this transect configuration was established. This month is expressed in M or MM format. Dates reflect measurements taken in local time. Local time is Pacific Standard Time except during months when Pacific Daylight Time is effective.

The day of the month this transect configuration was established. This date is expressed in D or DD format. Dates reflect measurements taken in local time. Local time is Pacific Standard Time except during months when Pacific Daylight Time is effective.
